desc: At SeaLife SeaPlants, we strive to provide natural, high quality, seaweed-based products that meet the needs of farmers, gardeners, and pet owners. These products include our signature liquid seaweed fertilizer SeaBoost, our SeaBlend for horses, our SeaBlend for cats and dogs, and our Diatomaceous Earth.

layout.text: This amazing natural resource is rich in nutrients and minerals and offers extraordinary potential for both human and animal health as well as wellness, agriculture, and backyard gardeners.
